Understate: The claim may understate the fact that the Obama administration did not immediately release information on White House visitors when he first took office.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the Obama administration is posting all White House visitor logs online.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that posting White House visitor logs online will restore trust in government without providing evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for why the Obama administration started posting White House visitor logs online, such as legal pressure from organizations like CREW.
